front.title: Multi-Layer OAM for Service Function Chains in Networks

abstract.t: This document discusses a multi-layer approach to the task of Operation, Administration and Maintenance (OAM) of Service Function Chains (SFCs) in networks. Based on the SFC OAM requirements, a multi-layer model is introduced. A mechanism to detect and localize defects using the multi-layer model is also described in this draft.
